props.block: Expands the button to 100% of available space.
props.disabled: Removes the ability to click or target the component.
props.fab: Designates the button as a floating action button. The button will become round.
props.outlined: Makes the background transparent and applies a thin border.
props.plain: Removes the default background change applied when hovering over a button.
props.shaped: Applies a large border radius on the top left and bottom right of the card.
props.text: Makes the background transparent. When using the color prop, the color will be applied to the button text instead of the background.
props.value: The value to use when selecting components in a group. If not provided, index is used.
